items.title: Sabrina Carpenter Goes Back to Basics With a Look Fit for a Country Music Star
items.excerpt: A red bandana, a white horse, and faded blue jeans: Sabrina Carpenter has officially gone full country music star. Yesterday, the Grand Ole Opry announced that Carpenter would be making her debut at the Nashville institution as part of its ongoing 100th anniversary celebration…
